package builderimport "fmt"const (defaultMaxTotal = 10defaultMaxIdle  = 9defaultMinIdle  = 1)// ResourcePoolConfig resource pooltype ResourcePoolConfig struct {name     stringmaxTotal intmaxIdle  intminIdle  int}// ResourcePoolConfigBuilder ç”¨äºæ„å»º ResourcePoolConfigtype ResourcePoolConfigBuilder struct {name     stringmaxTotal intmaxIdle  intminIdle  int}// SetName SetNamefunc (b *ResourcePoolConfigBuilder) SetName(name string) error {if name == "" {return fmt.Errorf("name can not be empty")}b.name = namereturn nil}// SetMinIdle SetMinIdlefunc (b *ResourcePoolConfigBuilder) SetMinIdle(minIdle int) error {if minIdle < 0 {return fmt.Errorf("max tatal cannot < 0, input: %d", minIdle)}b.minIdle = minIdlereturn nil}// SetMaxIdle SetMaxIdlefunc (b *ResourcePoolConfigBuilder) SetMaxIdle(maxIdle int) error {if maxIdle < 0 {return fmt.Errorf("max tatal cannot < 0, input: %d", maxIdle)}b.maxIdle = maxIdlereturn nil}// SetMaxTotal SetMaxTotalfunc (b *ResourcePoolConfigBuilder) SetMaxTotal(maxTotal int) error {if maxTotal <= 0 {return fmt.Errorf("max tatal cannot <= 0, input: %d", maxTotal)}b.maxTotal = maxTotalreturn nil}// Build Buildfunc (b *ResourcePoolConfigBuilder) Build() (*ResourcePoolConfig, error) {if b.name == "" {return nil, fmt.Errorf("name can not be empty")}// è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼if b.minIdle == 0 {b.minIdle = defaultMinIdle}if b.maxIdle == 0 {b.maxIdle = defaultMaxIdle}if b.maxTotal == 0 {b.maxTotal = defaultMaxTotal}if b.maxTotal < b.maxIdle {return nil, fmt.Errorf("max total(%d) cannot < max idle(%d)", b.maxTotal, b.maxIdle)}if b.minIdle > b.maxIdle {return nil, fmt.Errorf("max idle(%d) cannot < min idle(%d)", b.maxIdle, b.minIdle)}return &ResourcePoolConfig{name:     b.name,maxTotal: b.maxTotal,maxIdle:  b.maxIdle,minIdle:  b.minIdle,}, nil}

Any other panic remains.    // å¦‚æœbufferæº¢å‡ºäº†ï¼Œä¼šå¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªbytes.ErrTooLargeçš„é”™è¯¯    // å¦‚æœå¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯bytes.ErrTooLargeé”™è¯¯ï¼Œå°†å…¶è¿”å›ï¼Œå…¶ä»–panicé”™è¯¯ï¼Œä»ç„¶panicdefer func() {e := recover()if e == nil {return}if panicErr, ok := e.(error); ok && panicErr == bytes.ErrTooLarge {err = panicErr} else {panic(e)}    }()    // åˆ¤æ–­capacityçš„å€¼æ˜¯å¦è¶…è¿‡äº†intç±»å‹çš„ä¸Šé™if int64(int(capacity)) == capacity {// å‘bufferå½“ä¸­å¢åŠ capacityçš„å®¹é‡buf.Grow(int(capacity))    }    // ä½¿ç”¨buffer ReadFrom æ–¹æ³•è¯»å–æ‰€æœ‰çš„io.Readeræ•°æ®_, err = buf.ReadFrom(r)return buf.Bytes(), err}

// Grow grows the buffer's capacity, if necessary, to guarantee space for// another n bytes. After Grow(n), at least n bytes can be written to the// buffer without another allocation.// If n is negative, Grow will panic.// If the buffer can't grow it will panic with ErrTooLarge.// å¿…è¦æ—¶ä¼šå¢åŠ ç¼“å†²çš„å®¹é‡ï¼Œä»¥ä¿è¯nå­—èŠ‚çš„å‰©ä½™ç©ºé—´ã€‚// è°ƒç”¨Grow(n)åè‡³å°‘å¯ä»¥å‘ç¼“å†²ä¸­å†™å…¥nå­—èŠ‚æ•°æ®è€Œæ— éœ€ç”³è¯·å†…å­˜ã€‚// å¦‚æœnå°äºé›¶æˆ–è€…ä¸èƒ½å¢åŠ å®¹é‡éƒ½ä¼španic ErrTooLarge é”™è¯¯ã€‚func (b *Buffer) Grow(n int) {if n < 0 {panic("bytes.Buffer.Grow: negative count")}m := b.grow(n)b.buf = b.buf[0:m]}

// ReadFrom reads data from r until EOF and appends it to the buffer, growing// the buffer as needed. The return value n is the number of bytes read. Any// error except io.EOF encountered during the read is also returned. If the// buffer becomes too large, ReadFrom will panic with ErrTooLarge.// ReadFromä»rä¸­è¯»å–æ•°æ®ç›´åˆ°ç»“æŸå¹¶å°†è¯»å–çš„æ•°æ®å†™å…¥ç¼“å†²ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚å¿…è¦ä¼šå¢åŠ ç¼“å†²å®¹é‡ã€‚// è¿”å›å€¼nä¸ºä»rè¯»å–å¹¶å†™å…¥bçš„å­—èŠ‚æ•°ï¼›ä¼šè¿”å›è¯»å–æ—¶é‡åˆ°çš„é™¤äº†io.EOFä¹‹å¤–çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚// å¦‚æœç¼“å†²å¤ªå¤§ï¼ŒReadFromä¼šé‡‡ç”¨é”™è¯¯å€¼ErrTooLargeå¼•å‘panicã€‚func (b *Buffer) ReadFrom(r io.Reader) (n int64, err error) {    // const opInvalid = 0  // Non-read operation. è¡¨ç¤ºä¹‹å‰æ²¡æœ‰è¯»æ“ä½œb.lastRead = opInvalid    // If buffer is empty, reset to recover space.    // å¦‚æœç¼“å†²åŒºä¸ºç©ºï¼Œé‡ç½®ä¸ºæ¢å¤ç©ºé—´ã€‚if b.off >= len(b.buf) {b.Reset()    }    // å¾ªç¯è¯»å–io.Reader çš„æ•°æ®for {        // åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰å‰©ä½™ç©ºé—´æ˜¯å¦å°äºMinReadï¼ŒMinRead = 512if free := cap(b.buf) - len(b.buf); free < MinRead {            // not enough space at end            // ç©ºé—´ä¸è¶³            // æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªbuf            newBuf := b.buf            // åˆ¤æ–­å®é™…å‰©ä½™å®¹é‡æ˜¯å¦å°äºMinRead = 512if b.off+free < MinRead {// not enough space using beginning of buffer; package merge//INFINITY ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒå¤§çš„å€¼ç”¨ä½œå“¨å…µconst INFINITY = 0xfffffunc merge(arr []int, start, end int) {if start < end {//ä»ä¸­é—´åˆ’åˆ†ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹æ’åºmid := (end + start) / 2merge(arr, start, mid)merge(arr, mid+1, end)//ä¸‹é¢è¿›è¡Œå½’å¹¶æ“ä½œï¼Œå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªé•¿åº¦è¾ƒå°ä½†æ˜¯å·²ç»æ’åºå®Œæˆçš„æ•°ç»„åˆå¹¶æˆä¸€ä¸ªè¾ƒé•¿é•¿åº¦çš„æ’åºæ•°ç»„//æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ç”¨äºå­˜æ”¾å·¦è¾¹çš„å€¼arr1 := make([]int, mid-start+2)copy(arr1, arr[start:mid+1])arr1[mid-start+1] = INFINITY//æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ç”¨äºå­˜æ”¾å³è¾¹çš„å€¼arr2 := make([]int, end-mid+1)copy(arr2, arr[mid+1:end+1])arr2[end-mid] = INFINITY//æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§å°j, k := 0, 0for i := start; i <= end; i++ {if arr1[j] <= arr2[k] {arr[i] = arr1[j]j++} else {arr[i] = arr2[k]k++}}}}

package quik//Sort å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºfunc Sort(arr []int) {Quik(arr, 0, len(arr)-1)}//Quik å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºé€’å½’å®ç°func Quik(arr []int, left int, right int) {if right-left < 2 {return}p := middle3(arr, left, right)i := left + 1j := right - 2for {for arr[i] < p {i++}for arr[j] > p {j--}if i < j {arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]} else {break}}arr[i], arr[right-1] = arr[right-1], arr[i]Quik(arr, left, i-1)Quik(arr, i+1, right)}func middle3(arr []int, left int, right int) int {center := (right + left) / 2if arr[left] > arr[center] {arr[left], arr[center] = arr[center], arr[left]}if arr[left] > arr[right] {arr[left], arr[right] = arr[right], arr[left]}if arr[center] > arr[right] {arr[center], arr[right] = arr[right], arr[center]}arr[center], arr[right-1] = arr[right-1], arr[center]return arr[right-1]}

       $oimg=$img;        $c=imagecolorallocate($img, 255, 255, 255);        for($i=-30;$i<30;$i++){            $simg=imagerotate($img,$i,$c);//            //è®¡ç®—å­—ç¬¦å®½åº¦            $simg_hash_data=$this->getWidth($simg);            $w=count($simg_hash_data);            if($w<$min_w){                $oimg_hash_data=$simg_hash_data;                $min_w=$w;            }        }        $out_img_w=count($oimg_hash_data);        $out_img_h=count($oimg_hash_data[0]);        $out_img = imagecreatetruecolor($out_img_w,$out_img_h);//åˆ›å»ºä¸€å¹…çœŸå½©è‰²å›¾åƒ        $bg=imagecolorallocate($out_img, 255, 255, 255);//èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ç”»ä¸ºç™½è‰²        imagefill($out_img, 0,0, $bg);        return $hash_img;    }    /**     * è·å–å›¾åƒçš„å®½åº¦     * @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz>     * @param $img å›¾åƒèµ„æºå¥æŸ„     * @return int     */    public function getWidth($img){        //æ ¹æ®èµ„æºå¥æŸ„è·å–æ•´ä¸ªå›¾åƒçš„é«˜ä¸å®½        $img_w=imagesx($img); /*** @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz>* @param string $url è·å–å›¾ç‰‡çš„ç½‘å€* @param string $fileName ä¿å­˜çš„åœ°å€ä»¥åŠæ–‡ä»¶å*/function getImg($url, $fileName)    {        $ch = curl_init();        $fp = fopen($fileName, 'w+');        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 0);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 60);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE,$fp);        curl_exec($ch);        curl_close($ch);        fclose($fp);    }

/*** @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz>* @param string $url* @param string $fileName*/function getCode($url = 'http://www.169ol.com/Mall/Code/getCode', $fileName = './img/code.png')    {        $this->_code_cookie = dirname(__FILE__)."/pic.cookie";        $ch = curl_init();        $fp = fopen($fileName, 'w+');        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 0);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 60);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FILE,$fp);        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->_code_cookie);        curl_exec($ch);        curl_close($ch);        fclose($fp);    }

/** * å»é™¤å™ªç‚¹ * @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz> * @param $hash_data * @return mixed */public function removeHotSpots($hash_data){    for($i = 0; $i < $this->_image_h; $i++) {        for ($j = 0; $j < $this->_image_w; $j++) {            if($hash_data[$i][$j]){                if($this->isHotSpots($i,$j,$hash_data)) $hash_data[$i][$j]=0;            }        }    }    return $hash_data;}/** * åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å™ªç‚¹ * @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz> * @param $i * @param $j * @param $hash_data * @return bool ture:æ˜¯å™ªç‚¹,false:ä¸æ˜¯ */public function isHotSpots($i,$j,$hash_data){    if($i == 0 || $j == 0 || $i == ($this->_image_h - 1) || $j == ($this->_image_w - 1)) return true;    //å¾…æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä¹ä¸ªç‚¹    $points[0]=$hash_data[$i-1][$j-1];    $points[1]=$hash_data[$i-1][$j];    $points[2]=$hash_data[$i-1][$j+1];    $points[3]=$hash_data[$i][$j-1];    $points[4]=$hash_data[$i][$j];//å¾…æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹    $points[5]=$hash_data[$i][$j+1];    $points[6]=$hash_data[$i+1][$j-1];    $points[7]=$hash_data[$i+1][$j];    $points[8]=$hash_data[$i+1][$j+1];    $count=0;    foreach ($points as $v){        if($v){            $count++;        }    }    return $count<4;}

/** * @author mohuishou<1@lailin.xyz> * @param $n * @return array */public function splitImage($n){    $data=[];    $a=$this->_image_w/self::CHAR_NUM;    for($i=$n*$a;$i<($n+1)*$a;$i++){        $column=array_column($this->_hash_data,$i);        if(implode("",$column)!=0){            $data[]=$column;        }    }    $out_img_w=count($data)+4;    $out_img_h=count($data[0])+4;    $out_img = imagecreatetruecolor($out_img_w,$out_img_h);//åˆ›å»ºä¸€å¹…çœŸå½©è‰²å›¾åƒ    $bg=imagecolorallocate($out_img, 255, 255, 255);//èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ç”»ä¸ºç™½è‰²    imagefill($out_img, 0,0, $bg);    //ä¸€åˆ—ä¸€åˆ—çš„è¿›è¡Œç”»å›¾    foreach ($data as $k=>$v){        foreach ($v as $key=> $val){            $color=255;            if($val) $color=0;            $c = imagecolorallocate($out_img, $color, $color, $color);            imagesetpixel($out_img, $k+2,$key+2, $c);        }    }    return $out_img;}
